How do I launch a new currency on the Verus network, and what are the requirements for its launch? Additionally, how can I convert VRSCTEST to the new currency, and how can I create a new currency that can be converted to with either the new currency or VRSCTEST?

To launch a new currency on the Verus network, you need to fund the currency with at least 10 VRSCTEST before sending the transaction to initiate the currency launch. The launch will start 50 blocks from when the transaction was made, and it must have 1000 VRSCTEST preconverted at a specified rate (e.g., 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD) in order to launch. This process is part of the mining process, and mining the blocks that launch a currency earns the 0.025% conversion fees of participation in the launch, converting VRSCTEST to the new currency.

To convert VRSCTEST to the new currency, you can use the `sendcurrency` command before the block where the new token launches. For example:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
This will effectively park your conversion until the token launches, at which point, you will either find the converted amount of the new currency in your wallet, or you will have your VRSCTEST back.

If the new currency launches successfully, you can create a new currency that can be converted to with either the new currency or VRSCTEST. To do this, you can use the `definecurrency` command to define the new currency's properties, such as its name, options, proof protocol, currencies, and initial supply. For example:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST definecurrency '{"name":"mycoin","options":33, "proofprotocol":2,"currencies":["vrsctest", "gold"],"minpreconversion":[10000,5.1298]}, "initialsupply":20000'
```
This command defines a new currency named "mycoin" that can be converted to with either VRSCTEST or GOLD.

After it launches, the only way at present to create new tokens is with a centralized issuance option. To convert VRSCTEST to GOLD, you could issue the command:

 ```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
that would effectively park my conversion until the token launches, at which point, I will either find 0.975 GOLD in my wallet, or I will have my VRSCTEST back.
